name: GUROBU (itch)
description:
5 days, 2 apartments, 1 haunting.

"GUROBU" is a story-driven, 2D horror game inspired by Lone Survivor and SH4 about haunted apartments and ghosts of the past.

FEATURES
  • 1+ hour long.
  • 5 endings!
  • 4 nightmares to explore!
  • Name your cat!

Available in English and Russian.

CONTROLS

Arrows = Move

SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text

F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen

ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text)

If you've  enjoyed the game, please, consider supporting me on Patreon!
